title: Decline of states, cultural and social change

content.question: In the period circa 1200 to 1450, imperial collapse and dynastic change occurred in many parts of the world. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which the decline of states led to cultural or social changes during this period.

frqParts.text: In the period circa 1200 to 1450, imperial collapse and dynastic change occurred in many parts of the world. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which the decline of states led to cultural or social changes during this period.

topic.text: 1.7: Comparison in the Period from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
